skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: In my frontend development experience across e-learning platforms, hotel and restaurant digital menus, and various other projects, I've honed skills in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Leveraging frameworks like React.js , I've created dynamic and responsive interfaces, ensuring seamless user experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Building upon my expertise in frontend development, I've expanded my skill set to encompass backend development, particularly focusing on Node.js. Leveraging frameworks like Express.js, I've constructed RESTful APIs and integrated databases such as MongoDB. With a strong emphasis on authentication, authorization, and real-time communication, I ensure the security and responsiveness of backend systems. Complemented by rigorous testing and deployment practices, my backend solutions seamlessly integrate with dynamic frontend interfaces, delivering cohesive and user-centric experiences.
